summary:
If you ever think to yourself,  I want to chat with that person, but I don't want to bother them. 

STOP, go send them a dm, they may also want to chat with you, but feel too anxious to send a dm.

In the worst case scenario they will just ignore you,  it's fine.

Please do dm people
